about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: About Us
about.description: Our founders consist of a Naval Architect and Computer and Electrical-Electronics Engineers, graduates of Istanbul Technical University from different disciplines with up to 15 years of experience in their fields. This team operates as a technology company that offers original solutions with AI-powered ERP software developed with an innovative and sector-specific approach.
about.highlight: Our company, formed by the collaboration of young entrepreneurs focused on innovation and quality, aims to provide innovative and effective solutions to the needs in the sector.

technological_promises.title: Our Technological Promises
technological_promises.subtitle: Building the future today with our solutions equipped with modern technologies

solutions.title: Solutions Offered by MMS
solutions.subtitle: MMS, which offers industry-specific solutions for the shipbuilding sector, ensures that projects are managed more efficiently, controlled and profitably.

items.title: Integrated Process Management
items.description: Ensures coordination and minimizes operational errors by combining different stages and components of the shipbuilding process on an integrated platform.

items.title: Automation and Digitalization
items.description: Prevents time losses and increases efficiency by automating and digitalizing manual processes.

items.title: Cost Control
items.description: Increases profitability by preventing unnecessary expenses through effective tracking and management of costs.

items.title: Competitive Advantage and Innovation
items.description: Provides businesses with competitive advantage through its user-friendly interface, advanced features and continuously updated structure.

items.title: Information and Data Management
items.description: Supports strategic decision-making processes through effective management and analysis of collected data.

footer.description: Innovative AI-powered ERP solutions for the shipbuilding industry. Optimize your shipbuilding processes with modern technology.

newsletter.title: Stay Informed
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on innovations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aim to make shipbuilding processes more efficient, transparent and sustainable by providing our customers with the most innovative, original and effective AI-powered ERP solutions in the sector. Focusing on customer needs, we closely follow developing technology and support them in optimizing their business processes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: As MMS, we develop innovative AI-powered ERP solutions to simplify and improve complex business processes in the shipbuilding industry. We use our technological capabilities to provide the highest level of service to our customers and offer customizable solutions suitable for sector-specific needs.

promises.title: What Do We Promise?
promises.description: We promise to achieve the highest efficiency in the shipbuilding industry by providing the most suitable solutions to our customers' needs. By closely following the developments in the sector, we develop innovative software that will optimize your business processes and increase the success of your projects.

features.description: Complete digitalization and automation of processes

features.description: Access from anywhere, secure data storage and automatic updates

software.title: Our Software
software.description: MMS is an AI-powered digital transformation and ERP management system specifically developed for businesses operating in the shipbuilding industry.

list.title: Industry-Specific Solutions
list.description: Offers sector-specific modules and workflows fully compatible with shipbuilding processes and terminology.

list.description: Software developed according to the needs and dynamics of Turkey's shipbuilding industry, providing Turkish language support.

list.description: Can be customized and scaled according to business needs thanks to its modular structure.

list.description: Features an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that simplifies business processes for users in the shipbuilding industry.

list.title: Competitive Pricing
list.description: Stands out with competitive pricing models compared to high-cost foreign competitors.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.description: It will be developed using modern and widely used software development technologies and tools (Java, Python, JavaScript, MySQL, PostgreSQL, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Git, Jira, Confluence).

infrastructure.title: Existing Infrastructure Compatibility
infrastructure.description: Thanks to its cloud-based structure, businesses do not need to make complex and costly hardware investments.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Designed to integrate with other software (accounting, CRM, supply chain, etc.).
